name: I Always Knew
description:
The race is getting closer, and you still haven't recovered from your injury. But you're not alone. Rebuild your skills with the help of your friend in this 3D platformer about the power of friendship.

This was submitted to Game Devcember Jam 2021. The theme was "Recovery".

  • Time to finish: 15 minutes
  • Controls: WASD to move, Mouse or Arrow Keys to look around, Spacebar to jump and interact, R to restart a level. You may need to click inside the game window if the controls are not working.
  • Audio: Music and sound effects from Pixabay, If the audio does not play, you may need to use Chrome or Firefox. Artists: Lesfm, UrsaDaBear, SergeQuadrado, Alex MakeMusic, Bansemer, RICHERlandTV
  • Other Assets: Images from Pixabay. Photographers: ArtTower and svetlanabar
  • Ages: Everyone

To learn more about the main character, you can play JJ!
